Window.onCloseQuery

機能/意味
Confirm closing window
タイプ
Windowクラスのイベント
構文
onCloseQuery(canclose)
引数
canclose 　Passed if the window can be closed. In the process of calling the event handler of the upper class from the lower class, the "whether the window can be closed" determined by the lower class is passed.
説明
　Event to check if the window can be closed. If you cannot close the window, pass false as an argument to the same method of the higher class.
